values.ctor:
<init>(initialRef: V, initialStamp: Int)
            Creates a new AtomicStampedReference with the given initial values.

values.desc: Atomically sets the value of the stamp to the given update value if the current reference is == to the expected reference.

values.code: compareAndSet(expectedReference: V, newReference: V, expectedStamp: Int, newStamp: Int)
values.desc: Atomically sets the value of both the reference and stamp to the given update values if the current reference is == to the expected reference and the current stamp is equal to the expected stamp.
Returns the current values of both the reference and the stamp.
Returns the current value of the reference.
Returns the current value of the stamp.
Unconditionally sets the value of both the reference and stamp.

values.code: weakCompareAndSet(expectedReference: V, newReference: V, expectedStamp: Int, newStamp: Int)
values.desc: Atomically sets the value of both the reference and stamp to the given update values if the current reference is == to the expected reference and the current stamp is equal to the expected stamp.
